lead_paragraph: TANANBAUM--Stanley. Columbia University Medical Center celebrates the life and mourns the passing of Stanley Tananbaum, a great friend to our institution, and a supporter of our Division of Cardiology and Departments of Ophthalmology and Neurology. The generosity of Mr. Tananbaum and his late wife, Doris, to the clinical research and training efforts in Cardiology, the Retina Research Fund in Ophthalmology, and the Doris and Stanley Tananbaum Stroke Center, have helped us make extraordinary progress. We extend our condolences to the extended Tananbaum family. Lee Goldman, M.D., Executive Vice President and Dean of the Faculties of Health Sciences and Medicine, Chief Executive, Columbia University Medical Center 1/3
